SessionConfigurator.summary: The main SessionConfigurator Class that handles the execution options and providers for the inference process.

GetSessionOptions.summary: Creates a SessionOptions with all available execution providers.
GetSessionOptions.returns: SessionOptions with all available execution providers.

SystemCheck.summary: Appends any execution provider available in the current system.
SystemCheck.remarks: This function is mainly verbose for tracking implementation progress of different compute APIs.

ComputeCheck.returns: An integer identifier for each compute platform.
